decision_conditions: The development to which this permission relates shall be begun not later than the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.
Reason: To comply with Section 91 of the Town & Country Planning Act 1990. | The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with drawing / document title number(s):

24/542/LP/01 (Location Plan); 24/542/SP/EX/01 (Existing Site Plan); 24/542/SP/PR/01 (Proposed Site Plan); 24/542/PH/01 (Site Photographs); 24/542/EX/01 (Existing Floor Plans); 24/542/EX/02 (Existing Roof Plan); 24/542/EX/03 (Existing Street and West Elevations); 24/542/EX/04 (Existing Garden Elevation); 24/542/PR/01 Revision A (Proposed Floor Plans); 24/542/PR/02 Revision A (Proposed Roof Plan); 24/542/PR/03 Revision A (Proposed Street and West Elevations); 24/542/PR/04 Revision A (Proposed Garden Elevation)
Reason: For the avoidance of doubt and in the interests of proper planning.
| All external materials to be used in the development hereby approved shall be as per those described in the submitted application form and plans listed in Condition 2.

Reason: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings, in accordance with policies 1.1 & 1.2 of the Ealing Core Strategy (2012), policies 7.4 & 7B of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013), policies D3 and D4 of the London Plan (2021) and the National Planning Policy Framework (2023).
description: Part single and part two storey rear extension (following demolition of existing rear extension)
